short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to communicate Vivaldi browser with Qbserve time tracker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension reports **Vivaldi and Brave** usage to Qbserve time tracker for macOS. It's NOT for Chrome because Chrome is tracked automatically â€“ without an extension.

Please note: it does NOT work without Qbserve app. You need to install the app first: https://qotoqot.com/qbserve/
